ingredientStatement.text: Ingredients: Tomato Puree (Water, Tomato Paste), Bacon Bits (Bacon [Cured With Water, Salt, Sugar, Smoke Flavor, Sodium Phosphate, Sodium Erythorbate, Sodium Nitrite]), Sugar, Cheese Paste (Granular And Provolone Cheese [Milk, Cultures, Salt, Enzymes], Whey, Water, Salt, Natural Flavor), Onions, Canola Oil, Contains Less Than 1% Of: Garlic, Salt, Flavoring, Parmesan Cheese (Part Skim Milk, Cultures, Salt, Enzymes), Citric Acid, Basil, Black Pepper, Spice, Onion Extract, Yeast Extract, Garlic Extract.

productText.text: Enjoy smoky bacon and Provolone flavor!
productText.textHTML: Enjoy smoky bacon and Provolone flavor!

productText.text: Use as an ingredient or shortcut for dishes your family will love
productText.textHTML: Use as an ingredient or shortcut for dishes your family will love

productText.text: Prego® Flavored with Bacon & Provolone Italian Sauce is rich and savory with the smoky flavor of bacon balanced with cheese.
productText.textHTML: Prego® Flavored with Bacon & Provolone Italian Sauce is rich and savory with the smoky flavor of bacon balanced with cheese.

productText.text: Prego® Flavored with Bacon & Provolone Italian Sauce boasts rich and savory flavors that accent the sweet, vine-ripened tomato taste. The smoky flavor of bacon and balance of Provolone cheese make this sauce perfect as is, or as a great base for your own family-pleasing recipes.
productText.textHTML: Prego® Flavored with Bacon & Provolone Italian Sauce boasts rich and savory flavors that accent the sweet, vine-ripened tomato taste. The smoky flavor of bacon and balance of Provolone cheese make this sauce perfect as is, or as a great base for your own family-pleasing recipes.

productText.text: Prego® Italian sauces are made with sweet vine-ripened tomatoes and savory herbs and seasonings you can taste in every bite. Whether you’re in the mood for a zesty tomato sauce or a rich, creamy Alfredo sauce—Prego brings irresistible taste your whole family will love.
productText.textHTML: Prego® Italian sauces are made with sweet vine-ripened tomatoes and savory herbs and seasonings you can taste in every bite. Whether you’re in the mood for a zesty tomato sauce or a rich, creamy Alfredo sauce—Prego brings irresistible taste your whole family will love.

customProductName.text: Prego® Flavored With Bacon & Provolone Italian Sauce, 24 oz.
